metadata.title: CVE-2019-6992 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A stored-self XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/controlcaps.php ofZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML orJavaScript code in a vulnerable field via a long NAME or PROTOCOL to theindex.php?view=controlcaps URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6992` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1').
